title: Learn Chinese the Fun Way FREE
creator: Chinese Artword Academy

extendedInfo.description: Teach Mandarin with Pinyin, kids Art, Beginner Characters,Words,Vocabulary and PhrasesLearn Chinese the Fun Way App is suitable for parents who want to teach their children Chinese, and for preparing preschool children for Primary 1. Learn Chinese the Fun Way App helps learners to:-	Build strong foundation to understand, recognize, remember and write Chinese characters-	Build ability to recognize symbols and radicals in words-	Learn many useful compound words, phrases and idioms-	Develop confidence and enthusiasm in children to study and speak Chinese and to read Chinese books by themselves-	Unleash childrenâsâ creativity: translating Chinese characters into artBenefits:- Suitable for bilingual education system- Parents learn and teach: All-in-one app containing hints and tips for teaching on radicals, pictographs, phonetic connections, pinyin, char stories, traditional characters, compound words, âLearn these firstâ -	Logical, easiest and fastest approach: use bilingualism, relating through art drawings, ancient scripts and traditional characters-	Systematic learning syllabus - compound words contain only characters that have been taught earlier so that learner does not encounter âunknownâ characters in reading examples-	Vivid and fun approach: writing tips and drawing board for practice-	Easy to benchmark progress and plan revisions using user customized âFavoritesâ lesson -	Reference material for children & learners with easy to use search toolbar-	Free upgrades of later versions to more than 1000 charactersFeatures:- Meanings of characters and compound words in English- Animated character stroke sequence- Writing tips highlighting important points and common mistakes- Hanyu Pinyin, audio pronunciations- Ancient script, traditional character references- Artword drawing representations- Drawing board â drawings can be created and saved- Radicals, phonetic hints, pictograph descriptions, character stories	- Learn These First â links to preceding characters that are related- Compound words â examples of words and phrases formed with character- Character search feature, search history- Customize a lesson, save characters to FavoritesLearn reviews.title: Well worth your time!
reviews.comment: This app has an excellent framework for connecting the root of the radical with is ancient source and a fun picture to remember the radical. A great app!
reviews.author: John K
